comments:
1. install the latest RAC (20050718_1050)
2. launch RAD 6.0
3. run a test suite

Error message IWAT4039E pops up.

.log
......
!ENTRY org.eclipse.hyades.test.ui 4 0 Jul 25, 2005 09:31:16.953
!MESSAGE IWAT4039E The Test Execution Harness reported the following problems: 
org.eclipse.core.runtime.CoreException
!STACK 1
org.eclipse.core.runtime.CoreException: IWAT4039E The Test Execution Harness 
reported the following problems: IWAT0016E The Agent Controller is not 
available on host localhost.
 Make sure that:
* the Agent Controller is installed.
* the Agent Controller is configured to communicate with your machine.
* you have the correct host name and port number for the Agent Controller.
	at 
org.eclipse.hyades.test.ui.launch.delegates.AbstractLaunchConfigurationDelegate.
launch(Unknown Source)
	at org.eclipse.debug.internal.core.LaunchConfiguration.launch(Unknown 
Source)
	at org.eclipse.debug.internal.ui.DebugUIPlugin.buildAndLaunch(Unknown 
Source)
	at org.eclipse.debug.internal.ui.DebugUIPlugin$6.run(Unknown Source)
	at org.eclipse.core.internal.jobs.Worker.run(Unknown Source)
!SUBENTRY 1 org.eclipse.hyades.test.ui 4 0 Jul 25, 2005 09:31:16.968
!MESSAGE IWAT4039E The Test Execution Harness reported the following problems: 
IWAT0016E The Agent Controller is not available on host localhost.
 Make sure that:
* the Agent Controller is installed.
* the Agent Controller is configured to communicate with your machine.
* you have the correct host name and port number for the Agent Controller.

I hope this is user error.  I have never seen this type of symptom reported 
before.  Can you please double check that the RAC is running?  Can you confirm 
that it is not running in secure mode?  Can you get a connection to port 10005 
by telnet?  i.e. when you do

telnet localhost 10005

do you get a blank screen (indicating a connection), or do you get an error 
like

Connecting To localhost...Could not open connection to the host, on port 
10005: Connect failed

yes, RAC is running in secure mode. 

The latest rac is by default secure enabled.

I don't know how a change like that gets checked in without some discussion.  
I am pretty certain that the owners of the RAC know that test execution 
doesn't work with secure RAC, so I'm surprised to hear that it became the 
default without some sort of notice.....

Marking as a dupe of the existing defect about test execution not support 
secure RAC.

*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 95846 ***

traces.message: IWAT4039E The Test Execution Harness  reported the following problems: IWAT0016E The Agent Controller is not  available on host localhost.  Make sure that: * the Agent Controller is installed. * the Agent Controller is configured to communicate with your machine. * you have the correct host name and port number for the Agent Controller.
